name: Xingqiu
title: Guhua Guru of Feiyun Fame
description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

normalattack.name: Guhua Style
normalattack.description: Performs up to five rapid strikes. When charged, unleases two rapid sword strikes.

elementalskill.name: Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen
elementalskill.description: Deals Hydro DMG using twin strikes and creates Rain Swords that circle Xingqiu. This increases his interruption resistance. If he takes DMG, the Rain Swords shatter.

elementalburst.name: Gugua Sword - Raincutter
elementalburst.description: Creates Rainbow Bladework, which summons sword illusions and makes Normal Attacks do Hyro DMG.

passivetalent1.name: Flash of Genius
passivetalent1.description: When Xinhqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, there's a 20% chance that a portion of crafting materials used will be refunded.

passivetalent2.name: Hydropathic
passivetalent2.description: If a Rain Sword gets shattered or the time limit runs out, the current character's HP regenerates 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passivetalent3.name: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passivetalent3.description: He gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.d1: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.
constellations.d2:
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3s.
 Decreases the Hydro RES of enemies hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword - Raincutter by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Guhua Sword - Fatal Rainscreen by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.c6: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.d6: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword - Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit enemies.

profile.description: The second son of the Feiyun Commerce Guild, Xingqiu has had a reputation for being studious and polite ever since he was a young child. But there is another side to the mild-mannered Xingqiu everyone knows. A daring, adventurous and much more mischievous side...
